title: Welcome to Catalyst
description: A platform for petitions and social change.

sections.name: About
sections.content: Catalyst is a platform where users can create and sign petitions to bring about positive change.

sections.name: How It Works
sections.content: Users can create petitions, gather signatures, and push for change in society.

sections.name: Contact Us
sections.content: For inquiries, please email us at contact@catalyst.com.
